description: This file defines mock API handlers for animal behavior data, providing asynchronous functions to retrieve various datasets such as animals, behaviors, reports, behavior counts, and heatmaps. It imports mock data from JSON files and constants, processes behavior types, and exposes these functions for use in a frontend application.

methods.name: getSelectedAnimal
methods.description: Returns a mocked animal profile enriched with additional details such as sex, age, enclosure, status, and last seen date.

methods.name: getBehaviorCounts
methods.description: Returns counts of behaviors categorized by type.

methods.name: getDurationBreakdown
methods.description: Provides a breakdown of total behavior duration per type.

methods.name: getDailyHeatmap
methods.description: Generates a heatmap array representing activity counts per hour.

methods.name: getBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Returns the list of behavior types present in the data.

methods.name: getBehaviors
methods.description: Retrieves the list of all behaviors.

ctags.name: behaviors
ctags.pattern: /^const behaviors = (behaviorsRaw as any[]).map((b: any) => ({ ...b, type: normalizeBehaviorType(b/
